Description:
The Perfect Investment Opportunity!
Sitting proudly upon its own title, this home offers the perfect blend of low-maintenance and convenient living! With an excellent tenant in place until the 20th of December and hoping to stay long-term, astute investors will need to act swiftly to secure this perfect package!
Ideally positioned within easy reach of all of Leopolds amenities, this location will leave you wanting nothing. The Leopold Sportsmans Club is a short stroll away for a great meal, while the Bellarine Rail Trail inspires outdoor adventures. Convenience is key with Kensington Road also home to a Medical Centre, the Leopold Primary School, Leopold Community Hub, and Leopold Library. The shops and cafes of the Gateway Plaza are wonderfully close by, along with the Leopold Memorial Reserve sporting grounds. And to top it all off, a short drive will find you in the heart of Geelong or exploring the scenic Bellarine Peninsula.
The open plan living/dining zone welcomes you into the home and creates a wealth of space for when family and friends come to visit. A sliding door opens onto the north-facing yard, which creates a lovely spot to relax and soak up the sunshine. The kitchen takes care of all your cooking needs with a built-in pantry, oven, gas hob, rangehood, and dishwasher. The breakfast bar is ideal for casual dining.
Two bedrooms with built-in robes share close access to the tidy bathroom and separate toilet. The laundry is complete with storage and external access. You'll be comfortable all year long thanks to a split-system air conditioner.
The remote single lock-up garage provides secure parking, while easy care gardens are a blessing.
When it comes to easy and convenient living, this home packs a punch! Inspect ASAP!

Description:
Lifestyle acreage on the fringe of the CBD with endless opportunities
Sitting on 4912m2 with a north facing backyard, this property has an array of possibilities set in tightly held Moolap. The 3 bed, 1 bath, 1 living home is a blank canvas ready to be transformed. Move straight in, with the potential to further enhance, extend, renovate, or demolish and build your dream home (STCA) this really is a once in a lifetime opportunity.
Currently you will find a 12m x 5.8m shed and an additional 4m x 5m shed with 2 access driveways off High St.
This fantastic blank canvas lifestyle property is ideally located 2 mins drive to nearby shops, 15 minutes to the Bellarine Peninsula and less than 5 mins drive to Geelong CBD and waterfront.
- North Facing backyard
- 4912m2
- Develop STCA
- Rent approx $360pw

Description:
Scenic Hilltop Retreat 19.59ha 48.4 acres approx
Elevated in a private & tranquil locale overlooking the rolling Barrabool Hills, this superbly positioned 52 acre lot (approx.) and family home offers single level living with expansive valley views on the border of the tightly held countryside of Barrabool and Ceres.
Owned by the same family for over 40 years, the homestead comprises of 3 bedrooms (ensuite to main), 2 bathrooms (family with sep bath & shower), kitchen with stunning views plus great bench & cupboard space (incl. elec appliances), sep meals area, a large family lounge with combustion wood fire & cooling unit, study nook, mud room, sep laundry, underfloor elec slab heating (zoned per room) plus a double garage.
The home effortlessly takes advantage of its stunning elevated position with multiple alfresco spaces perfect for warm summer evenings, and has been carefully designed to maximise the surrounding established gardens, veggie patches and a tranquil leafy BBQ / entertaining space.
Providing a perfect blend of semi-rural living, including the option to renovate/re-build to further capitalise on the hilltop views, this highly desirable property is ideally suited to mixed farming, cropping, sheep, cattle or horses and offers the chance to acquire a superb lifestyle retreat or productive investment property.
Presenting as one main paddock (incl. cattle grid) and house lot, the property includes a lovely winding creek, established trees, two main dams, four bay machinery shed, garden shed, extra garden utility storage units with basins/water supply, a one stand shearing shed with an adjoining work/tool shop with mezzanine floor, two 75,000L (approx.) underground water tanks, two 25 000L poly tanks and septic sewerage.
Perfectly positioned in such a tightly held area this property will be hard to pass on, with easy access to Highton Village, Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Deakin University, Epworth Hospital, prestigious Geelong schools, Geelong CBD, Surf Coast and the Melbourne CBD via the nearby Ring Road.

Address: 3 Clear Water Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Pretty as a Picture
Beautifully placed right in the heart of the Golf Course precinct is this delightful custom built residence; boasting an unrivaled welcome home feel, it is sure to be highly sought by prospective purchasers!
The stunning garden setting is sure to awaken your every sense; a visual spectacle in full bloom, the tranquility of abundant bird life, lovely floral aromas and the various highly productive fruit trees... yum!
Liveability features including solar panels, cross ventilation and multiple water tanks further endorse the wonderful green lifestyle on offer!
Character filled, light and bright generous living zones and quality fixtures are a consistent theme throughout.
Three beautifully appointed bedrooms; master is positioned to the rear (lovely window features frame the garden) and is complete with dual built in robes and ensuite.
The primary living zone consists of a kitchen/family/meals area. The kitchen boasts expansive bench tops and great storage solutions.
The second independent living area is a real feature! A huge bay window works beautifully with the northerly aspect; a lovely spot to take in early coffee. The gas log fire, decorative cornices and high ceilings create a grand space and add further flexibility to the floor plan.
A sheltered alfresco is paved and provides another sitting area to admire the gardens; I have it on good authority the built in BBQ cooks the best snags
A double garage with the enviable feature of drive through access via rear roller door; room enough for the cars, boat and even the jet ski
All the modern comforts; ducted heating, split system cooling, ceiling fans and many more features to be discovered on further inspection

Description:
EXCEPTIONAL Value for Money!
For the ultimate WOW factor look no further than 11 Humber Way, Drysdale! There is so much more to this Drysdale residence than meets the eye a true market standout.
The practicality and open plan design of this home certainly caters for the growing family, giving all members room to move. Another fantastic highlight of this home is the ability to entertain, with the multiple living areas and the central kitchen overlooking the bifold doors and undercover area makes for easy breezy entertaining.
The fore of the home is graced with a very lavish master suite measuring 6.8 x 4.2 which gives you plenty room for a reading nook, it also includes a high tech ceiling fan, decked out walk-in robe and impressive ensuite sporting 40mm double in-bench waterfall stone vanity and quality fittings and fixtures. A generous theatre room before flowing into the heart of the home. The open plan kitchen, meals and multiple living areas is a very appealing highlight of this home! The galley style kitchen includes stone benchtops, quality stainless steel appliances such as a dual Smeg rangehood, Omega double wall ovens, Fisher and Paykel double drawer dishwasher, walk-in pantry and ample cupboards and drawers. The dining area sits neatly in between the 2nd living area to the right and the rumpus to the left. The rear to the home is zoned with the 4th living/lounge room, bedrooms 2,3 and 4 are all fitted with built-in robes and equipped with a main bathroom where the quality has carried through including a tiled in deep bath and separate toilet. The laundry is neatly located off the kitchen with an abundance of storage and access into the garage and the yard. The rumpus room and 4th living area have fantastic access via the timber bifold doors out onto the expansive double decked alfresco which has been fitted with café blinds, ceiling fan, lights and outdoor power. In addition to this impressive area there is an undercover barbequing area and plenty of room to run around or implement a garden of your choice. This low maintenance garden also comes with gated access to the rail trail- can this home get any better?
Features of this already impressive pad include quality timber floors, new carpets, freshly painted throughout, evaporative cooling, ducted heating, custom lighting, alarm system, double lock up garage with remote/internal and external access.
This home is the pinnacle of practical family living coupled with a sizeable block on 700+m2 with the Bellarine Rail Trail on your doorstep and moments to all the Townships major amenities including schools and public transport.
Properties in this pocket don't last long, strike while the iron is hot!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
The Perfect First Home Or Investment!
Occupying a corner block, this residence puts the elements in place for blissful living! Side access to the backyard also makes this an ideal choice for those looking to store caravans, boats, or trailers!
With the Bellarine Rail Trail and local playground only a short stroll from your front door, the whole family will be inspired to venture outside and enjoy the fresh air. Public transport is also within walking distance, while a short drive will place you at the Leopold Primary School, Leopold Library, and Leopold Community Hub. The Gateway Plaza provides you with all of your shopping and dining needs, while the Portarlington Highway grants easy access to both Geelong and the Bellarine Peninsula.
Timber laminate floorboards grace the beautifully presented interiors. The open plan living/dining/kitchen zone provides a peaceful retreat and opens onto the north-facing alfresco creating a beautiful setting for everyday enjoyment or casual gatherings with loved ones!
Making a stylish statement in all-white, the kitchen showcases stone benchtops, a built-in pantry, and chic pendant lighting over the breakfast bar. Stainless steel appliances include a dishwasher and 900mm oven, gas hob, canopy rangehood.
The Master Bedroom features a walk-in robe and direct access to the bathroom, which boasts a shower, bathtub, and single vanity. Two additional bedrooms are complete with built-in robes, while the laundry and separate toilet complete the functional layout. Two split-system air conditioners and a gas wall heater keep you comfortable in all seasons.
Youll love spending your weekends kicking back on the sun-drenched alfresco, while children and pets alike will have plenty of room to play in the secure backyard. Low-maintenance gardens leave you free to enjoy the more important things in life.
The double lock-up garage provides parking, while backyard vehicle access is ideal for additional vehicle storage.
Dont miss this opportunity to secure a beautiful home in a peaceful pocket of Leopold! Inspect ASAP!

Description:
A beautiful lifestyle on 5 acres (approx.).
Sale by SET DATE 12/11/2019 (unless sold prior)
This property lays on approximately 5 acres, offering perfection for any family looking to secure their very own acreage in such a sought-after location. Whether you're looking to enjoy what is already on offer or get renovating immediately, this home is for you.
You will appreciate the privacy this home grants you. It comprises of four bedrooms offering built in robes, formal living as well as an open plan kitchen/living/dining area, central bathroom & an additional ensuite. Some finer luxuries are the granny flat or private retreat at the rear with its own bathroom, laundry, bedroom, & outdoor deck, as well as the freshly built two car garage, tennis court & existing paddocks.
Its location has been highly praised. You're a 20 minute drive (approx.) to the Geelong CBD & Portarlington, 10 minutes to Ocean Grove, a scenic drive to the world renowned Great Ocean Road & nearby to some of the region's most popular wineries & family amenities. You truly need to inspect this home to witness the entirety of what is on offer.

Description:
A RARE OPPORTUNITY KNOCKS!
A rare opportunity has presented itself for those looking to downsize their home but still enjoy the benefits of approx 590m2 parcel of land in the coastal town of Clifton Springs. Features of the home include a gas log fireplace and split system for year round comfort as well as a gorgeous master bedroom that flows out onto the expansive, lush north facing rear yard with direct access onto a reserve! A second bedroom, generous open plan living, dining and kitchen plus secure garage with workshop complete the home. This really is the ideal choice for those looking to downsize without having to compromise on space and privacy. Call for an inspection today!

Address: 141 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Easy Living Upon Approx. 671m2!
Set upon approx. 671m2, this home presents a terrific opportunity for first homebuyers, families, investors, and renovators alike (STCA)! Positioned within easy reach of all that Clifton Springs and Drysdale has to offer, a laidback lifestyle is yours to keep!
Your weekends will be filled with outdoor adventures thanks to the Clifton Springs Golf Course, boat ramp, and scenic coastline just moments away. Public transport and the Delungra Avenue playground are a short stroll from your front door, while the bustling hub of Drysdale places supermarkets, cafes, and restaurants within easy reach. Growing families will be spoilt for choice with Clifton Springs Pre-School, Clifton Springs Primary School, and Drysdale Primary School close by.
The original interiors grant you the option to move straight in or to rejuvenate with a contemporary touch (STCA). The light-filled lounge creates the perfect spot to pop up your feet and relax, while the kitchen/meals zone flows outside. The kitchen is well equipped with a built-in pantry, oven, gas hob, and rangehood.
All three bedrooms feature built-in robes and share close access to the bathroom and separate toilet. The laundry is complete with external access.
Two gas wall heaters and ceiling fans provide comfort.
The secure backyard provides a generous play space for children. Its size also offers the potential for buyers to create a superb outdoor entertaining area or to extend the home (STCA). A rainwater tank and garden shed put the practical elements in place.
The double lock-up garage provides secure parking, while the wide driveway offers additional off-street parking for boats, caravans, or trailers.
Whether you want to move straight in, have plans to renovate (STCA), or youre on the hunt for a great investment opportunity, this home will be at the top of your list! Inspect without delay!

Description:
STYLISH TOWNHOUSE, BAY VIEWS & WALK TO TOWN
This 3 bedroom townhouse will entice the astute buyer. Tiled entrance, open plan living area, dining, kitchen and undercover outdoor patio framed by leafy landscaped garden ... easy to entertain. Third bedroom downstairs, powder room, study nook and laundry. Upstairs are the 2 main bedrooms, two way bathroom and WIR. Other features include ducted heating, two air conditioners, quality fittings and furnishings, storage and generous single garage. Solar panels reduce electricity costs. Live well now, invest well or buy now to live later.

Description:
Your New Family Home Awaits
This incredible family home is meticulously kept inside and out and has something for the entire family. Set on a huge 931m2 allotment with drive through access to the rear of the property and to a separate garage measuring 8m x 3m (approx).
Ideal for a young family this incredible 4 bedroom home boasts 2 bathrooms and two terrific sized living areas and is ideally located next to the Leopold Primary School and the expansive Leopold Gateway Plaza.
The living spaces inside are all well illuminated by natural light with their north/west facing aspect, which creates a beautiful warm appeal. The large family rooms boast views over the City Of Greater Geelong.
The kitchen features updated stainless appliances and is decorated in lovely neutral tones. The expansive lawn and outdoor areas that surround the home are ideal for a young family to fully enjoy. The addition of a private gazebo provides for an ideal backdrop to entertain all year round.
This home is sure to impress every member of your family so get in quick as this home will not last.

Description:
Love The Home, Love The Lifestyle
Positioned in one of Clifton Spring’s premier neighbourhoods, this immaculate single level home promises an elegant coastal lifestyle, with the benefits of a lush tree canopy at your back door!
Presenting as new, this centrally located home is steps to Drysdale Primary and Drysdale Village, with Clifton Springs’ safe bay beach, friendly Golf Club and boat ramp all just a short drive away.
The Facts:
-Stylish 4BR dual living home central to key family amenities
-Surrounded by newer custom homes in a premium established street
-Set across 633sqm of native landscape with tiered rear garden
-OP living with glass windows and doors capturing natural leafy views
-Dining with sliding glass access to aggregate entertaining alfresco
-Caesarstone kitchen boasts freestanding Westinghouse oven and d/w
-2nd living sits adjacent to elegant master with large WIR and ensuite
-Zoned children’s or guest wing, the 4th BR with sliding door to alfresco
-Undercover outdoor entertaining with bay glimpses and bush aspect
-Drought tolerant native shrubs and trees with no lawn maintenance!
-Ceiling fans, evaporative cooling and ducted gas heating throughout
-Neutral interiors contrast with mature garden vistas from every window
-Heightened ceilings and doors and premium laminate timber flooring
-Plantation shutters to street facing windows and quality roller blinds
-DLUG with rear and int. access, walk-in-linen store and laundry with ext. access
-600m to Drysdale Primary School and 100m to Sundial Reserve and playground
The Owner Loves…
“We love walking in through the front door and seeing the greenery of the bushland at the rear, and the birdlife we get to see is something quite special. It’s so quiet, the streets are filled with lovely homes and the park in our street is great for kids.”

Description:
CONTEMPORARY & STYLISH ABODE
This stunning architecturally designed & custom built Dennehy residence showcases class and style of a calibre rarely seen. From the very first steps through the front garden landscaped with beautiful natives you will feel as if you have finally found the one! Upon entering the home you are instantly greeted by the warmth of Tasmanian Oak flooring and the contemporary & spacious feel of the cleverly designed floor plan which sympathizes with the natural flow of the land over two levels. The northerly aspect of the landscaped rear garden is perfectly captured through the floor to ceiling glass sliding doors of the open plan kitchen, dining & living space which features superb polished concrete floors & an ambient double sided fireplace enjoyed by dual living areas. An expansive deck spans the entire length of the lower level of the home and is perfect for entertaining. The stunning kitchen features a minimalist design with a deluxe walk in pantry and quality fixtures and fittings. This fabulous home further comprises 4 generously proportioned bedrooms including Master suite with WIR & stylish ensuite plus a third living space also suited as a kids activity area or study. This truly is an amazing opportunity to secure a luxurious home built into the natural landscape with an abundance of space, style & privacy on approx 807m2 with nothing to do but move in and enjoy the Bellarine lifestyle!

Description:
Low-Maintenance Living In A Walk To Everything Locale!
Offering low-maintenance living in a convenient locale, this home presents an irresistible choice for investors!
With the expansive Gateway Plaza just a short stroll away, you'll be spoilt for choice with an abundance of shopping and dining options. The sporting grounds of Leopold Memorial Reserve are also within easy walking distance from your front door, along with public transport and the Gateway Sanctuary. Young families will appreciate that Leopold Primary School, Leopold Community Hub, and the Leopold Library are just moments away. A short drive will place you on the scenic Bellarine Peninsula, where you can spend your weekends hitting the surf or savouring the region's finest wineries. The Portarlington Highway also grants easy access to the delights and conveniences of Geelong.
Positioned at the front of the block and boasting its own driveway, this home is an absolute treat. Overlooking the front garden, the north-facing open plan living zone creates a lovely setting for everyday enjoyment. The kitchen takes care of all your cooking needs with a built-in pantry, generous island bench, and stainless steel appliances (dishwasher, oven, gas hob, rangehood). You'll love soaking up the sunshine in the secure courtyard, which is home to a lemon tree.
Two bedrooms feature built-in robes, while the generous bathroom boasts an open shower, single vanity, and toilet. The European laundry adds the finishing touch to the functional layout.
You'll be comfortable in all seasons with two split-system air conditioners and ceiling fans.
The remote single lock-up garage with internal access provides secure parking.
Positioned within walking distance to all that Leopold has to offer, this low-maintenance property is the ultimate package! You'll need to act quickly to avoid disappointment!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Unique Acreage Opportunity on the Bellarine Peninsula
An exceptionally rare opportunity to purchase over 20 acres of land on the Bellarine Peninsula presents to the market offering an incredible opportunity to own a substantial parcel of land situated in a beautiful waterside location. Including direct access to the bay, this impressive property offers the best of bayside living with easy access to Ocean Grove, Barwon Heads and Portarlington as well as being only minutes from the Geelong CBD. The convenience of the city, with the serenity of the bay.
As the local attractions, wineries and residential growth in this area continue to flourish, the size, position and proximity to the bay this property offers becomes an increasingly appealing and unique opportunity.

Description:
YOU YANGS ARE YOUR VIEW BACK DROP
Whether you are relaxing on the balcony or hard at work in the kitchen you will be positioned perfectly to watch the ships coast through the bay with the You Yang's as there back drop.
Situated in the quiet and elevated Taronga Court is this brick veneer home. The kitchen is neat and is well equipped with plenty of bench and cupboard space and tiled floor. The family room has timber floor boards providing a nice warm feeling and access to the sunny north facing balcony.
The master bedroom features an ensuite and all 3 bedrooms offer BIR's and study nooks. Behind the double carport you will find a workshop/studio as well as a separate garden shed. Under the house is another large sealed storage area.
A 9000lt water tank services the garden with an electric pump. The back yard is enormous and the size of the land provides many options for a pool if desired.
With a little work this home can be restored to its former glory. The bathrooms are done and the kitchen is very functional. So if you are looking for a project with a view then why not arrange to have a look.

Address: 23 Bay Shore Avenue Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Impressive family home
Offering the warmth of a well loved family home, great street appeal & low maintenance gardens. The built in slow combustion wood fireplace is a feature in the spacious family lounge. The lounge extends from the front of the house to the back & could be a library nook or a place for the musician.
A separate dining room could work as a casual lounge.
The kitchen with Kleenmaid dishwasher, rangehood, induction hotplates, wall oven & a pull out pantry.
A bay window makes the master bedroom light filled, with walk through robe & roomy ensuite.
The central bathroom services two spacious north facing bedrooms, both with built in robes.
The large covered entertaining area makes a great outdoor space.
There are two split systems air-conditioners to heat the whole house in winter and cool it down in summer.
Clifton Springs is emerging as an exciting new opportunity on the Bellarine Peninsula for those seeking bayside living, the beaches are building up after groin works & the bay offers safe shallow swimming. Clifton Springs sheltered boat harbour is one of the best on the west side of Port Phillip Bay. With Coles, Safeway & Aldi stores just minutes away & with Bunnings & Kmart just 15 minutes down the road, this is a great town to live in.

Description:
Family Location with Room for the Boat!
Located in a quiet cul-de-sac this 544m2 allotment will please plenty of buyer types. This corner block offers dual vehicle access via the front and side boundaries, very handy if you need a place to keep the caravan or boat - and boasts a 17m wide parcel giving you amazing scope to build a spacious family home while the North facing backyard means you'll be able to take full advantage of the sun all year round! The property also enjoys an elevated position giving the lucky purchaser potential for a fantastic outlook from their new home. From this location you'll be able to enjoy walking distance to the beach as well as a wealth of local amenities close by such as Drysdale shopping precinct, Clifton Springs Primary School, Day Care facilities, Curlewis shopping centre, Clifton Springs Golf club and many more. With title available you'll be able to get started on your new home immediately. Don't hesitate and call today.

Description:
The Jewel Of Drysdale!
Do you desire the ultimate 'downsize' prospect? Perfectly positioned within one of Drysdale's premiere cul-de-sac's is this charming, character filled residence. A stunning tree lined street, quality homes as far as the eye can see, neighbouring parklands and a short stroll to Drysdale's fully equipped retail hub fully endorses the A+ location!
X2 generously proportioned bedrooms; master is complete with a trio of floor to ceiling built in robes and an ensuite
The primary living zone is a fine example of open plan design; an enviable northerly orientation is complemented by expansive windows which promote lovely filtered light and a front row seat to take in glorious established gardens
The kitchen serves up a wonderful space; there is absolutely no compromise on size and scale. Expansive benchtops and excellent storage solutions complement stainless steel appliances and quality fixtures
All the modern comforts; gas ducted heating, split system cooling, custom window furnishings and many more fine features to be discovered on further inspection
A prime land holding of 489m2 (approx) is enhanced by a stunning established garden setting; the corner allotment profile provides further user friendly qualities
A double remote controlled garage with internal access
The Bellarine Peninsula is a thriving market place; award winning wineries, a vibrant cafe and restaurant scene, fully equipped medical services, beautiful parklands and the tranquillity of the 'sea change' are all at 'arms reach' if you are lucky enough to secure the charming 1 Pascoe Place, Drysdale

Description:
Easy modern living in low-maintenance villa
Enjoy bright modern living without the maintenance hassles in this three-bedroom brick villa thats ideal for first-home buyers, young families and downsizers. Investors also note the strong rental demand in this popular central location thats moments to bus stops, Leopold Primary School, Gateway Plaza Leopold, Leopold Memorial Reserve and Gateway Sanctuary, and less than 20 minutes to Geelong CBD.
-- Tiled open-plan living/dining area with split-system air conditioning
-- Modern gas kitchen with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher
-- Bright master bedroom features a walk-in robe and well-presented ensuite
-- Walk-in robe also to second bedroom; built-in robe to third bedroom
-- Modern main bathroom with shower, bath and separate toilet
-- Covered alfresco patio in fenced, low-maintenance rear courtyard
-- Internal laundry with courtyard access; single lock-up garage
A practical floor plan joins easy undercover outdoor entertaining in this quality single-level villa that is set in pretty court setting.
Enter into the reception foyer with the carpeted master bedroom privately located on your right at the front of the home.
Turn left into the open-plan living/dining area that is air conditioned for your year-round comfort and flows onto the covered patio for easy alfresco entertaining.
The adjoining kitchen with large pantry offers everything the home chef needs; the light-filled second and third bedrooms are also carpeted; and the quality continues in the immaculate main bathroom.
Insights: 2/21 Kylemore Court, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2019 and 3 other 3 bedroom unit in Leopold have recently been sold.
